com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer

Class ProvidedBeansConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer.ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer.ProvidedBeansConfigurer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationContextConfigurer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingletonBeanConfigurer

    public class ProvidedBeansConfigurer
extends ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter
    Allows specifying a ProvidedBeansMap to provide to an ApplicationContext.

    • Method Detail

      • providedBeans

        public ProvidedBeansMap providedBeans()
        Returns a map of beans to register directly in the ApplicationContext. Provided beans will be registered first, before any of the annotated classes or defined packages are loaded.
        Specified by:
        providedBeans in interface ApplicationContextConfigurer
        Overrides:
        providedBeans in class ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter
        Returns:
        Map of bean name and value.
        See Also:
        ProvidedBeansMap

           Object value)
